original_text: Now while Paul was waiting for them at Athens, his spirit was provoked within him as he saw that the city was full of idols.
korean_text: 바울이 아덴에서 그들을 기다리다가 그 성에 우상이 가득한 것을 보고 마음에 격분하여

sentences.original_text: Now while Paul was waiting for them at Athens
sentences.korean_translation: 바울이 아테네에서 그들을 기다리고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: his spirit was provoked within him
as he saw that the city was full of idols
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 도시가 우상으로 가득 차 있는 것을 보았기 때문입니다
